onboarding_description_1: Your trusted platform for managing accounts, making payments, applying for loans, and more. Stay connected to your financial world with ease and security. Join us today!
onboarding_description_2: View your savings, checking, and loan accounts all in one place. Check balances, review transactions, and stay on top of your finances wherever you are.
onboarding_description_3: Easily apply for loans, track your loan status, and manage your payments. We make it easy for you to take control of your financial future.
onboarding_description_4: To register, you must already be a member of Dhaka Credit. Please have your registered mobile number ready. If you are not yet a member, please visit your nearest Dhaka Credit Service Center to register for membership and activate online services.
under_maintenance_page_message:
We are currently upgrading our system to serve you better.

Please check back shortly!
landing_page_login_instruction: If you are a member of Dhaka Credit and already have a user account, then login.
landing_page_create_account_instruction: If you are a member and registered for online service but don't have a user account, then create user account now.
landing_page_product_and_service_instruc: If you want to learn about our products and services, then visit
otp_verification_page_instruction:
Please enter the OTP sent 
to your mobile number.
info_menu_profile_description: Your personal information  and manage your profile from here.
info_menu_surety_status_description: View and track the current status of your surety and related obligations.
info_menu_card_description: View, manage, and request your  cards from here
accounts_menu_accounts_description: View and manage your  accounts, balances, and transactions from here
accounts_menu_open_an_account_descriptio: Process to open a new account quickly and easily from here
accounts_menu_dependents_description: Place for all your dependent accounts. You always add more.
loan_menu_my_loans_description: View details of your active loans,  outstanding balances
loan_menu_apply_for_a_loan_description: Submit a new loan application and check your eligibility and loan options
deposit_menu_deposit_now_description: Make an instant deposit to your account using available  methods
deposit_menu_deposit_latter_description: Schedule a deposit for a later time or choose a future deposit option
deposit_menu_deposit_from_bkash_descript: Easily deposit funds to your account directly through your bKash wallet
deposit_menu_deposit_request_status_desc: Track the status of your deposit requests and view related updates
deposit_menu_ereceipt_description: Access and download electronic receipts for your transactions
transfer_menu_transfer_to_bkash_descript: Send money directly from your account to a bKash wallet quickly and securely
transfer_menu_transfer_within_dhaka_crad: Transfer funds between your own accounts or to other members within Dhaka Credit
transfer_menu_bank_to_dhaka_cradit_descr: Transfer money from an external bank account to your Dhaka Credit account
transfer_menu_transfer_request_status_de: Check the status and history of your recent transfer requests
withdraw_menu_withdraw_through_atm_descr: Initiate or manage cash withdrawals from your account using an ATM
payment_menu_payments_description: Make payments for services from your account
family_menu_family_&_relatives_descripti: Your family members and relatives as a relation from here
family_menu_add_family_or_relatives_desc: Add your family members and relatives as a relation from here
beneficiary_menu_beneficiaries_descripti: Place for all your dependent accounts.
beneficiary_menu_add_beneficiaries_descr: Place for all your dependent accounts.
personnel_menu_leave_application_descrip: Submit a formal request for leave, specifying the dates and type of leave
personnel_menu_fallback_acceptance_descr: Approve or decline fallback leave requests based on availability and company policy
personnel_menu_leave_approval_descriptio: Review and approve or reject pending leave requests from employees
personnel_menu_leave_history_description: View and manage a history of your approved or denied leave applications
personnel_menu_attendance_description: Track your attendance records, including working hours and absences
personnel_menu_working_out_of_office_app: Submit a request to work remotely or outside the office for a specified period
Review and approve or reject employee requests to work outside the office
personnel_menu_working_out_of_office_his: View your history of approved or denied working out of office applications
personnel_menu_todays_punch_description: Record your in and out times for attendance on the current day
